entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning except temperature steady near zero near Pemberton.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow. Risk of freezing rain near Pemberton this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight.
